timeline.bodyHTML:
Just for my own edification, can you add a comment here?

Suggested change
if (accountRecord != null && refreshTokenRecord != null) {
removeRefreshTokenIfNeeded(accountRecord, refreshTokenRecord);
}
if (accountRecord != null && refreshTokenRecord != null) {
// This will not be true when we are called from MSAL C++, as the account will always be null.
removeRefreshTokenIfNeeded(accountRecord, refreshTokenRecord);
}

Feel free to reword.
